channel.title: Looking for a new host of pkscape
channel.description:
Hi,
well, are current host for pkscape is never on. So, i'm looking for a new host who can -provide remote access for me to his pc 24/7 (so i can update) -Must be able to hold 50 people no lag. -Must be able to leave the server running all day long 24/7. -Must have rep / or a proud member of pkscape who i can trust.
You will be tested by me to see if i think your legit, because i'm not going to give out to the source to just any random person.
For hosting - you will recieve admin and full access to pkscape forums, maybe some other stuff but will see :)
Cheers, Bezza

item.title: Looking for a new host of pkscape
item.dc:creator: @L_s_R L s R
item.description:
@L_s_R wrote:

[quote=“Bezza, post:7, topic:20448”]Ffs, i’m he. Yeah, i’m only doing it if i have remote access to the pc otherwise you can just scam -.-[/quote] So…Do you have anyone your gonna take?

Read full topic
